attributes.action: Keep Piers Morgan out of the UK & Territories
attributes.additional_details: In light of Piers Morgan's recent immigration problems -  as a result of him threatening the democracy of the United States of America - we the undersigned would like to assurances that in the event Piers Morgan is deported from the United States of America he is not allowed back to reside in the United Kingdom or any of the kingdom's territories.
